name: docker-volume-backup
description: Docker Volume Backup is a tool that allows scheduled backups of Docker volumes to cloud storage or local file systems. It includes retention policies, encryption, and supports running in a container itself.
features: Scheduled Backups: Automatic volume backups on custom schedules. Set and forget protection.
Cloud Storage Support: Backup to S3, Azure, GCS, and more. Flexible storage options.
Encryption: Secure backups with built-in encryption. Protected data at rest.
Retention Policies: Automatically clean up old backups. Efficient storage management.
Container-Native: Runs as a Docker container itself. Easy deployment.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over backup process and data. Your volumes, your backups.
